indications:
Indications fluid replacement (see notes above),
provision of energy (%s
(From 9.3 Intravenous nutrition: British National Formulary)
9.3 Intravenous nutrition); hypoglycaemia (%s
(From 6.1.4 Treatment of hypoglycaemia: British National Formulary)
6.1.4 Treatment of hypoglycaemia)
name: GLUCOSE
breadcrumbs: 9.2.2 Parenteral preparations for fluid and electrolyte imbalance
side-effects:
Side-effects glucose injections especially
if hypertonic may have a low pH and may cause venous irritation and
thrombophlebitis
doses:
Water replacement, see notes above; energy source, 1–3 litres
daily of 20–50% solution
